item.description:
On Friday Feb 8th 10:00 AM, at every state capital Nationwide, there will be a peaceful demonstration to support our 2nd amendment rights.  Your fellow citizens will be standing in protest against any, and ALL attempts to disarm the American people. This is our chance to reach out to our elected officials, and tell them NO NEW GUN LAWS! It’s time we take a stand.

The Price of Apathy Towards Public Affairs Is to Be Ruled by Evil Men. ~Plato

Please tell all of your friends, family, neighbors and even strangers about this crucial event.  If you think you have something more important to do this Friday "You Don't!"
item.how_to_find_us: Could it be any more important than your right to defend yourself your family and our great republic
item.name: Second Amendment Rally Every State Capital Nationwide Friday 10 a.m.
